[[=]]
**SCP-6121: "THE CAPSLOCK CREW"**
Cruise control for containment.

[[image http://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/this-page-intentionally-left-blank/Caps.png]]

**[[[http://www.scp-wiki.net/this-page-intentionally-left-blank|More by this author!]]]**
[[/=]]
[[include :scp-wiki:info:end]]
[[/div]]

[[div]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:anomaly-class-bar-source

]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:acs-peppo-split

----

[[include component:image-block
    name=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Ookpik.jpg|
    caption=SCP-6121-1 prior to containment. |
    width=296px
]]

**Special Containment Procedures:** Cliometria.aic is cataloguing all high-profile public events taking place within Canada and projected to feature at least one mascot character. One additional humanoid containment chamber must be prepared at [/secure-facility-dossier-site-43 Site-43] ahead of each such event. --A new chamber must also be prepared prior to each occurrence of the Winter Olympic Games.-- MTF Kappa-43 ("The Mediators") must be on-hand to capture any SCP-6121 instance which manifests; it must then be remanded to the new chamber.

----

**Description:** SCP-6121 is a blanket designation for a series of humanoid anomalies resembling human beings wearing mascot character costumes. In actual fact, the costumes are hollow; they are, however, universally capable of movement, vocalization, and apparently limited cognition. Each SCP-6121 instance manifests through unknown means at a large scale public event held within the nation of Canada, resembling said event's official mascot -- though always deviating from the approved design in one or several respects.[[span class="fnnum"]].[[/span]][[span class="fncon"]]Aberrant quadrennial manifestations suggest that whatever force controls the manifestation of SCP-6121 instances considers the Winter Olympic Games to be Canadian, whether taking place in Canada or not.[[/span]] Their actions are inexplicable, tending towards the ridiculous, and they universally communicate in extremely loud, flat tones. Their speech is only rarely pertinent, and very frequently incoherent.

----

**Addendum 6121-1, Partial Inventory:** A representative sample of SCP-6121 instances retrieved from the Site-43 Network Database (43NET) is reproduced below.

[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 12px; text-align: center"  colspan="4"]]
43NET: Catalogue of SCP-6121 Instances [SELECTED]
[[/hcell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-bottom:3px"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-1
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 11/16/1963
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Ookpik2.jpg]]

**Mascot:** A stylized depiction of a snowy owl in the style of Inuit handicrafts, known as an "Ookpik."

**Deviations:** SCP-6121-1 has human proportions. Genuine Ookpik are typically the size of small plush animals.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-1 vandalized the Canadian displays at the 1963 Philadelphia trade fair, which Ookpik had been created to advertise, by ramming into the booth walls and screeching.

[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]
[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 11/16/1963
**Present:** Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Chief Strauss:** Hello, SCP-6121. I'm going to ask you a few questions.

**SCP-6121-1:** HOOT HOOT MOTHER FUCKER.

**Chief Strauss:** ...I beg your pardon?

**SCP-6121-1:** I'M A OWL.

//Silence on recording.//

//Sound of a door closing.//

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]

**Debriefing Log**

**Date:** 11/16/1963
**Present:** Dr. W. Rydderech (Chief, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Dr. Rydderech:** What on Earth was that?

**Chief Strauss:** Did you hear... I don't...

**Dr. Rydderech:** You look how I feel.

**Chief Strauss:** I've never seen anything like it. I don't get this at //all.//

**Dr. Rydderech:** Is it dangerous?

**Chief Strauss:** It doesn't //seem// dangerous. But I can't make heads or tails of it.

**Dr. Rydderech:** Archives and Revision will start combing the database. There's got to be a precedent.

**Chief Strauss:** There isn't. Our subjects are never... funny.

**Dr. Rydderech:** Oh, is it supposed to be funny? Is that what it thinks it's doing?

**Chief Strauss:** It's a //little bit// funny.
[[/div]]

A second interview was conducted three hours later.

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 11/16/1963
**Present:** Dr. W. Rydderech (Chief, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**SCP-6121-1:** HOOT HOOT.

**Chief Strauss:** We've been over that.

**SCP-6121-1:** CAW.

**Chief Strauss:** That's... owls don't...

**SCP-6121-1:** I'M NOT REALLY A OWL.

**Dr. Rydderech:** No?

**SCP-6121-1:** NO.

**Dr. Rydderech:** Then what are you?

**SCP-6121-1:** I'M A ANTHROPOMORPHIC PERSONIFICATION.

//Silence on recording.//

**Dr. Rydderech:** Really?

**SCP-6121-1:** YES.

**Dr. Rydderech:** That's terribly interesting.

**SCP-6121-1:** YES.

**Dr. Rydderech:** And what are you an anthropomorphic personification of?

**SCP-6121-1:** A MOTHER FUCKING OWL.

//Silence on recording.//

**SCP-6121-1:** MORON.

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]

**Debriefing Log**

**Date:** 11/16/1963
**Present:** Dr. V.L. Scout (Director), Dr. W. Rydderech (Chief, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Dr. Scout:** Thoughts?

**Dr. Rydderech:** Someone's screwing around.

**Chief Strauss:** Can't help but agree. This feels like a distraction.

**Dr. Rydderech:** A complete and utter waste of time. Lock it up, and throw away the key.

**Dr. Scout:** Does it eat?

**Chief Strauss:** I don't think it can.

**Dr. Rydderech:** Why not?

**Chief Strauss:** Because it's hollow, and there's a speaker in its beak.
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-11
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 07/18/1976
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Beaver.jpg]]

**Mascot:** A beaver by the name of "Amik," mascot of the 1976 Summer Olympic Games in Montréal, Québec.

**Deviations:** SCP-6121-11 has human proportions, despite being a beaver, and lacks Amik's red sash.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-11 was discovered drowning in the Lachine Canal, having apparently attempted to construct a beaver dam using structural elements removed from the Olympic Stadium.

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 07/18/1976
**Present:** Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. I. Okorie (Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Chief Strauss:** How are you settling in, 6121-11?

**SCP-6121-11:** DAM FINE PLACE YOU GOT HERE.

//Silence on recording.//

//Chief Strauss sighs.//

**SCP-6121-11:** DAM FINE PLACE INDEED.

**Chief Strauss:** Yes. Could you plea--

**SCP-6121-11:** DAM.

**Chief Strauss:** Yes, I got that. Could you please tell me where you came from?

**SCP-6121-11:** DAM SON, THAT'S PERSONAL.

**Chief Strauss:** Alright.

**SCP-6121-11:** DON'T ALRIGHT ME, GOD DAM IT.

**Chief Strauss:** Okay.

//Silence on recording.//

**SCP-6121-11:** BEAVER.
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 24px;background-color: #F3F3F3" colspan="2"]]
//"Beaver" on its own does not constitute a joke. I am almost one hundred percent certain of this.// [Strauss, Chief M.]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-top: 3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-bottom:3px"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-21
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 05/10/1979
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/War.jpg]]

**Mascot:** An anthropomorphic representation of the concept of "the military," created for the Military Contractors Convention held at Exhibition Place in Toronto, Ontario.

**Deviations:** The convention's mascot had only existed in iconographic form prior to this manifestation.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-21 was discovered in the foyer of a convention centre, quizzing a group of Italian-Canadians about their potential connections to deceased fascist dictator Benito Mussolini.

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 05/10/1979
**Present:** Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. E. Falkirk (Site-01 Liaison), Dr. I. Okorie (Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**SCP-6121-21:** WAR.

**Dr. Okorie:** Good god, y'all.

//Silence on recording.//

**SCP-6121-21:** WHAT?

**Dr. Okorie:** The song. "War."

**SCP-6121-21:** YOU KNOW WHO ELSE SINGS?

**Dr. Okorie:** No?

**SCP-6121-21:** COMMUNISM.

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]

**Debriefing Log**

**Date:** 05/10/1979
**Present:** Dr. V.L. Scout (Director), Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. E. Falkirk (Site-01 Liaison), Dr. I. Okorie (Senior Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Dr. Scout:** What's the current count on 6121 instances?

**Chief Strauss:** Twenty-one.

**Dr. Falkirk:** God almighty.

**Dr. Scout:** This is becoming untenable. Suggestions?

**Dr. Okorie:** Group containment. There's no reason they all need their own cells.

**Chief Strauss:** We don't know that. Could be whoever is making them //wants// us to put them all together. Maybe they, I don't know, turn into some bigger, more horrible, more //normal// thing.

**Dr. Okorie:** Maybe if they share a cell, they'll share a //brain// cell too, and we'll be able to get some answers out of them.

**Dr. Falkirk:** Maybe we should build a sausage machine.

**Dr. Okorie:** What?

**Dr. Falkirk:** You heard me.
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-top: 3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-29
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 02/12/1984
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Dog.jpg]]

**Mascot:** "Vučko," the wolf mascot of the 1984 Olympic Winter Games in Sarajevo, (then) Yugoslavia.

**Deviations:** Instead of a wolf, the costume depicts a typical mixed breed canine.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-29 was discovered accosting organizers and participants at each athletic event and very loudly speaking his own name, placing particular and undue emphasis on the first syllable (which was pronounced incorrectly).

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 02/12/1984
**Present:** Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. A. Euler (Chair, Mimesis and Cryptomancy), Dr. E. Falkirk (Site-01 Liaison), Dr A.J. McInnis (Researcher, Administration and Oversight), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment)

----

**Dr. McInnis:** I must admit, we're a little confused. You've only appeared at Canadian events thus far, and yet...

**SCP-6121-29:** BARK!

**Dr. McInnis:** ...I see.

**SCP-6121-29:** BARK!

**Dr. McInnis:** You're saying "Bark." As a word.

**SCP-6121-29:** BARK!

**Dr. McInnis:** Do you know any other words?

**SCP-6121-29:** DO YOU KNOW YOUR FACE IS ASYMMETRICAL?
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 24px;background-color: #F3F3F3" colspan="2"]]
//That was hardly proportionate.// [McInnis, Dr. A.]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]
**Note:** SCP-6121 instances appeared at all Olympic Winter Games from this point forward, regardless of hosting nation.
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-top: 3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-bottom:3px"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-34
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 02/14/1988
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Bear.jpg]]

**Mascot:** "Howdy," one of the "Hidy and Howdy" duo of cowboy-themed bears which served as the mascots for the 1988 Winter Olympic Games in Calgary, Alberta.

**Deviations:** The shape of the costume and hat are wrong, as are their colours; furthermore, what at first appears to be a bear costume is, in fact, a particularly portly dog costume.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-34 was discovered within the Olympic Village, attempting to create a fort for itself comprised of condoms supplied to Olympic athletes for the first time that year.

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 02/14/1988
**Present:** Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. E. Euler (Visiting Fellow, Mimesis and Cryptomancy), Dr. E. Falkirk (Site-01 Liaison), Dr. I. Okorie (Junior Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment), Agent O. Ready (Security and Containment)

----

**SCP-6121-34:** LUGE!

**Dr. Euler:** Uh huh. Are you being compelled to say that?

**SCP-6121-34:** LUUUUUUUUUUUUUGE!

**Dr. Euler:** That's great. What's the earliest memory you have?

**SCP-6121-34:** I'M OLYMPIC!

//SCP-6121-34 produces a small orange bottle from within its vest, and begins pouring pills over its face and occasionally into its mouth. Security and Containment personnel rush to restrain it.//

[[=]]
@@ @@
[[image https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/the-b-b-decommission/Asterisk43.png]]
@@ @@
[[/=]]

**Debriefing Log**

**Date:** 02/14/1988
**Present:** Dr. V.L. Scout (Director), Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. E. Euler (Visiting Fellow, Mimesis and Cryptomancy), Dr. E. Falkirk (Site-01 Liaison), Dr. I. Okorie (Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief M. Strauss (Security and Containment), Agent O. Ready (Security and Containment)

----

**Dr. Euler:** This week, on //Mascot Mayhem...//

**Dr. Scout:** They really are theatrical, aren't they.

**Dr. Falkirk:** It's definitely a performance. I don't think we should even interview them anymore. We're just giving them what they want. Look at this goddamn crowd...

**Dr. Euler:** What if what they really want -- assuming there's a "they" behind this at all -- is for us to get tired of interviewing them, and just stuff them in our holding cells? What if we miss something vital by doing that?

**Dr. Falkirk:** Yes, I'd hate to miss hearing the precise details of their master plan to annoy the bejesus out of everyone in hearing range.

**Chief Strauss:** Whose mascot are you, Edwin?

//Silence on recording.//

**Chief Strauss:** In unrelated news, tomorrow's my last day.
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-top: 3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]

[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-37
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 08/19/1992
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Frog.jpg]]

**Mascot:** Flippy the Frog, one of a series of mascots for the Downward Spiral Water Park located in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.

**Deviations:** The frog's costume is green instead of blue, and contains a large enough mouth and capacious enough throat to contain an entire human child.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-37 was discovered in the process of "eating" twelve-year-old Gregory Kaplin, causing no actual harm but considerable distress; it had performed this action intermittently (with multiple subjects involved) for two days before coming to Foundation attention.

----

[[div class="blockquote"]]
**Interview Log**

**Date:** 11/19/1992
**Present:** Dr. I. Achterberg (Researcher, Archives and Revision), Dr. C. Bold (Director, Decommissioning Department), Dr. E. Euler (Visiting Fellow, Mimesis and Cryptomancy), Dr. E. Falkirk (All-Sections Chief), Dr. I. Okorie (Researcher, Acroamatic Abatement), Chief O. Ready (Security and Containment), Specialist N. Zaman (Psychology and Parapsychology)

----

**SCP-6121-37:** GOT ANY CHILDREN?

**Specialist Zaman:** Yes, I have a son and a daugh--

**SCP-6121-37:** CAN I EAT THEM?

//Silence on recording.//

**SCP-6121-37:** YOU LOOK LIKE THE KIND OF DUDE WHO'D HAVE REALLY EDIBLE CHILDREN, IS ALL.
[[/div]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 24px;background-color: #F3F3F3" colspan="2"]]
//If I did something specific to get stuck on cannibal duty, I'd really like to know what it was.// [Zaman, Specialist N.]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-top: 3px; width: 100%"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; background-color: #BFE1EE; padding: 6px;"]]
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[/table]]
[[table style="border-collapse:collapse; margin-bottom:3px; margin-bottom:3px"]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Item #:** SCP-6121-41 to SCP-6121-44
[[/cell]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; width: 50%; padding: 12px"]]
**Date:** 02/11/1998
[[/cell]]
[[/row]]
[[row]]
[[cell style="border: 1px solid black; padding-right: 12px; padding-top: 12px; padding-bottom: 12px; padding-left: 12px;" colspan="2"]]

[[f>image http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/harry-blank-7/Chicken.jpg]]

**Mascot:** Sukki, Nokki, Lekki and Tsukki, four owlets who performed joint mascot service for the 1998 Winter Olympic Games at Nagano, Japan.

**Deviations:** All four instances are instead wearing chicken suits.

**Circumstances of Discovery:** SCP-6121-41 was discovered following random civilians around the Olympic grounds, cheeping and occasionally hooting loudly. SCP-6121-42, -43 and -44 were discovered in a nearby park, breaking the branches off every tree by attempting to stand on them.
